title: ArtText Studio
description: AI 驱动的文字艺术生成器，将文字转化为精美的视觉海报。支持 40+ 预设风格、AI 背景生成、11 种精选字体和灵活的排版布局。
descriptionEn: AI-powered text art generator that transforms words into stunning visual posters. Features 40+ preset styles, AI background generation, 11 premium fonts, and flexible layouts.
fullDescription: ArtText Studio 是一款 AI 驱动的文字艺术生成器，能够将你的文字转化为精美的视觉海报作品。无论是诗歌、名言还是日常文字，都能创作出独特的艺术构图。利用 Google Gemini AI 分析文本情感并推荐最佳视觉风格，提供 40+ 精选预设风格，涵盖现代、古典、赛博朋克等多种美学主题。支持 AI 自动生成艺术背景、11 种精选字体、5 种专业排版模式，以及精细的字体大小、行高、阴影、描边和背景效果调节。支持中英文双语界面，响应式设计适配桌面和移动设备，可导出高分辨率图片或一键复制到剪贴板。
fullDescriptionEn: ArtText Studio is an AI-powered text art generator that transforms your words into beautiful visual posters. Whether it's poetry, quotes, or everyday text, create unique artistic compositions with rich typography, intelligent layouts, and AI-generated backgrounds. Leverages Google Gemini AI to analyze text sentiment and recommend optimal visual styles. Features 40+ curated preset styles spanning modern, classical, cyberpunk, and more aesthetic themes. Supports AI background generation, 11 premium fonts, 5 professional layout modes, and fine-grained controls for font size, line height, shadows, strokes, and background effects. Bilingual interface with seamless Chinese-English switching, responsive design for desktop and mobile, and multiple export options including high-resolution download and clipboard copy.
features: AI 情感分析与风格推荐

title: 逃离后室存档管理器
description: Escape The Backrooms 游戏存档管理工具，支持存档备份、恢复、导入导出等功能。
descriptionEn: A save file management tool for Escape The Backrooms game, supporting backup, restore, import and export features.
fullDescription: 逃离后室存档管理器是一款专为 Escape The Backrooms 游戏打造的存档管理工具。使用 Tauri 框架开发，提供了完整的存档管理解决方案，包括查看所有游戏存档、编辑存档信息、删除存档、调整存档可视性、创建新存档等功能。界面配色美观，支持插件扩展和多语言，是 ETB 玩家的必备工具。
fullDescriptionEn: ETB Save Manager is a dedicated save file management tool for Escape The Backrooms game. Built with Tauri framework, it provides a complete save management solution including viewing all game saves, editing save info, deleting saves, adjusting save visibility, and creating new saves. With beautiful color scheme, plugin support and multi-language, it's an essential tool for ETB players.
